page.title: 14Population in Bishop Monkton
page.content: Although some of the farms in the area have been passed down in families there is now only a small proportion of residents born in the area. Most people with jobs have to travel to Ripon or Harrogate. There is a transient group of young professional families taking advantage of the good Primary school and catchment area for Ripon Grammar School. There are many retired people enjoying the good housing and pleasant quiet country atmosphere. A large minority of houses are occupied by one person as these elderly people gradually die, although the average age of retirement is decreasing as many more are taking early retirement.
